Statement on President Obama's plan to close Guantanamo: https://t.co/kDoExROx6S
President Obama must put our national security first, follow the law, and halt all plans to transfer Gitmo detainees to the United States.
Attorney General Lynch and Defense Sec. Ash Carter have confirmed the law “currently does not allow” Gitmo detainee transfers to the U.S.
President Obama’s plan to relocate dangerous terrorists to United States soil is not only reckless, but against the law.
Paul Ryan is uniquely gifted to lead. He is smart, strategic, selfless & a brilliant communicator. I am proud to support him for Speaker.
